section2.title: Punctual & Prompt Delivery with Trustworthy Services
section2.content: offers delivery services throughout Thailand for all kinds of goods. Safety is guaranteed with a 24-hour GPS tracking system and our long-time experience in logistics services. The company has been certified its quality services by Q-Mark and ISO9001:2015. Rest assured that your goods will receive high-quality, punctual transportation services in a competitive price.

paragraph.paragraph1: Intertransport and Logistics Co., Ltd. was established in 2004 with an authorized capital of 20 million Baht. Our office is located at 60/19 Sumnuk-I-Ngorn Rd. Mabkha, Nikompattana, Rayong 21180 Thailand.
paragraph.paragraph2: The company offers transportation services throughout Thailand with emphasis on quality, fastness and integrity in a competitive price. We also have goods insurance policies.
paragraph.paragraph3: Our team is well trained and experienced, and we never stop to utilize technology for better transportation service. With a growing list of prestigious customers, Intertransport and Logistics earns its position as one of the most successful transport companies in Thailand.

content1.title: Our <secondary-color>Vision</secondary-color>
content1.paragraph1: Advancement in logistics system to an international level in all aspects

content2.title: Corporate <secondary-color>Policy</secondary-color>
content2.item1: Carry out transportation service from manufacturing plants (hirer) to the designated location with completeness, safety and punctuality.
content2.item2: Every employee must behave with honesty and respect to his or her profession.
content2.item3: Drivers must take into account the safety of goods and vehicle and the society.
content2.item4: Drivers must not take any drugs nor drink alcoholics when on duty.
content2.item5: Drivers must perform work with ethics and conduct, both to families and the society.
content2.item6: Every employee must not cause trouble to the community, such as refrain from making loud noises that cause nuisance to nearby communities.
content2.item7: Every employee must not cause any harmful effects to nearby community or company environment, such as discarding litters, batteries or vehicle tires.

content3.title: Quality <secondary-color>Policy</secondary-color>
content3.paragraph1: We shall manage the company to meet global high-safety standards, with betterment of our employees and services quality by implementing and utilizing advanced technologies to maximize customerâ€™s satisfaction

item1.title: Reponsibility to Shareholders
item1.list1: Be good representatives of shareholders in operating the business for the shareholders' utmost satisfaction.
item1.list2: Perform work with honesty, ethics and conduct.
item1.list3: Truthfully report the results of business operation and the conditions of the business completely and constantly.
item1.list4: Not seek for personal benefits to oneself or any related persons by using any data of Intertransport and Logistics Co., Ltd. that has not been disclosed to the public.
item1.list5: Not disclose confidential data which might be of harm to Intertransport and Logistics Co., Ltd. to outside persons.

item2.title: Responsibility to Clients
item2.list1: Carry out quailty service in reasonable price for the client's utmost satisfaction and maintain good and sustainable relations.
item2.list2: Shall the client receive any unfair treatments, the client can file a complaint via the satisfaction questionnaire.
item2.list3: Behave to every client equally with justice, carry out work with transparency and service mind, and have good manners.

item3.title: Responsibility to Partners, Commercial Competitors and Commercial Creditors
item3.list1: Not ask for, receive nor give any commercially dishonest interest to partners, competitors and creditors.
item3.list2: If the company cannot comply to the conditions, the company must notify the partner, competitor and creditor in advance, to cooperate in finding solution to the problem.
item3.list3: Behave accordingly within the framework of good competitive regulations and not try to defame commercial competitors with false accusations.
item3.list4: Strictly maintain and comply to the conditions made with partners, competitors and officers, including payback, taking care of collateral and other conditions.
item3.list5: Report to officers in advance shall the company not be able to perform accordingly to the commitment in the contract and cooperate to find solution to the problem.

item4.title: Responsibility to Employees
item4.list1: Give reasonable compensation and benefit to the employees and provide obligations for the employees to comply with.
item4.list2: Take good care of the work environments and ensure safety to the life and property of the employee.
item4.list3: Appointing, moving, rewarding and punishing the employee must be done with equality and honesty and based on the knowledge and skills, appropriateness and performance or actions of the employee.
item4.list4: Give importance to improving the skills and knowledge of each employee by constantly and thoroughly giving opportunities to the employees.
item4.list5: Listen to comments and suggestions from employees of all ranks and allow employees to inform about the company's illegal action to their supervisor.
item4.list6: Avoid administering with unfair actions which might affect the employee's work stability.

paragraph1.content: <subtitle-text>Service Standard: </subtitle-text> Certified quality service by <secondary-color>Q-Mark</secondary-color> and <secondary-color>ISO 9001:2015</secondary-color>. We transport goods in correct location and punctually in reasonable price.

paragraph2.content: <subtitle-text>Confidence: </subtitle-text> Every vehicle can be tracked with the <secondary-color>GPS Tracking system</secondary-color>. The company has a <secondary-color>goods insurance policy</secondary-color> and takes into account the nature of each client for utmost satisfaction.

paragraph3.content: <subtitle-text>Management Team: </subtitle-text> With over 20 years of experience in administering transportation services, the management team is capable of utilizing the key points in management to utmost benefit.

item3.title:
Four-wheeler Pickup
Truck with Rear door Container
